nodes.bodyText: tenant theme is the resource here. Hence shall we use tenant-theme/upload or import?

Do we really have to provide the tenant domain name? Shouldn't we extract the tenant domain from the auth context? Unless an unauthorized tenant user can update the tenant theme of some other tenant domain.
